concept.description: Races determine starting conditions and base attributes. Unlike builds (which are chosen playstyles), races are contextual backgrounds that affect how you approach the game.
concept.analogy: In Skyrim, your race gives you starting bonuses. In Elden Ring, your starting class affects early game but not late game potential.

potential_races.note: These are brainstorm ideas, not finalized

ideas.name: Startup Founder
ideas.description: Speed over perfection, limited resources, high stakes

ideas.name: Solo Indie
ideas.description: Full autonomy, limited bandwidth, personal vision

design_questions: How do races interact with builds?
Are races permanent or can you change?
quick_load: Load races mindstate. We're designing character races. What dimensions matter?
